decorations.name: Classic Christmas Tree
decorations.description: A lush, green artificial Christmas tree with pre-attached warm LED lights, perfect for creating a cozy holiday atmosphere. Easy to assemble with a sturdy base for stability.

decorations.name: Santa Claus Figurine
decorations.description: A charming Santa Claus figurine, complete with a red suit, a gift bag, and jolly expression. Ideal for mantle displays or as a centerpiece for holiday decorations.

decorations.name: Snowflake String Lights
decorations.description: Twinkling snowflake-shaped string lights to brighten up any space. Battery-operated with multiple light settings, including steady glow and twinkle mode.

decorations.name: Christmas Wreath
decorations.description: A festive wreath adorned with red berries, pinecones, and a golden bow. Perfect for hanging on doors or walls to welcome guests during the holidays.

decorations.name: Nutcracker Soldier
decorations.description: A traditional wooden nutcracker soldier painted in vibrant holiday colors. A classic decoration that adds a touch of nostalgia to your Christmas decor.

decorations.name: Festive Table Runner
decorations.description: A red and gold table runner with intricate holiday patterns, perfect for enhancing your dining table setup for Christmas feasts.

decorations.name: Holiday Stockings Set
decorations.description: A set of four beautifully crafted stockings with festive designs, ready to be hung by the chimney for Santa's arrival.

decorations.name: Reindeer Figurines
decorations.description: A trio of elegant reindeer figurines with gold accents. Ideal for placing on mantles or under the Christmas tree.

decorations.name: Ornament Set
decorations.description: A set of 24 shatterproof ornaments in red, gold, and green. Includes a variety of shapes and sizes to create a stunning tree display.

decorations.name: Snow Globe
decorations.description: A magical snow globe featuring a winter wonderland scene with falling snowflakes. Plays a classic holiday tune to enhance the festive mood.
